meanings.definition: A social gathering at which food is cooked and eaten outdoors.
meanings.sent1: We had a fun cookouts with friends in the park last weekend.
meanings.sent2: Summer is the perfect time for cookouts in the backyard.
meanings.sent3: The cookouts turned into a dance party under the stars.
meanings.sent4: The cookouts were a feast for the senses, with sizzling food and laughter filling the air.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the cookouts lingered in the air, tempting everyone nearby.

meanings.definition: To cook food outdoors, typically on a grill.
meanings.sent1: Dad loves to cookouts burgers on the grill for dinner.
meanings.sent2: We decided to cookouts some hot dogs over the campfire.
meanings.sent3: The chef attempted to cookouts a gourmet meal on the beach, but the seagulls had other plans.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the cookouts wafted through the neighborhood, making everyone hungry.
meanings.sent5: She skillfully cookouts the vegetables to perfection, adding a touch of smokiness to the dish.
